title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Bridal Haaram - Chowkdi Design
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic Chowkdi design, featuring intricate diamond and emerald arrangements. The delicate filigree work and pearl drops add a touch of regal elegance. Each emerald is carefully placed to highlight the brilliance of the diamonds, and the Chowkdi pattern is a symbol of prosperity and good fortune.
occasions: Ideal for bridal wear ( పెళ్లి నగల )
and grand celebrations. Perfect for Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం) ceremonies and other auspicious occasions. Makes a statement piece for upscale social events.
description: This heirloom-quality Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of uncut diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and lustrous pearls creates a piece that is both opulent and elegant. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, making it a treasured piece for generations to come. Symbolizes prosperity, good health, and marital bliss.
